name: Aptoide bash downloader
tagline: Aptoide-Downloader lets Linux users download *.apk files directly from their computer.
body:
Aptoide-Downloader
==================

Aptoide-Downloader lets Linux users download \*.apk files directly on their computer from aptoide.com.
There's no need to install additional apps, just start the script, paste the link and you're good to go.

The \*.apks are saved in your **~/Downloads** directory, under the **aptoide** folder. **(~/Downloads/aptoide)**

You can also use this script on your phone. Just download it and save it somwhere convenient, then use a terminal emulator to run it.
(Phone version requires Busybox and a terminal emulator, tested only on Galaxy S2.)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
